description:
The Android Compatibility Layer for webOS revival edition!
TouchPad only.

This is a new release for 2026 which patches the (long-dead) activation process, strips out some dead apps, repairs the built-in App Mall, and replaces the dangerously broken uninstall script with a stand-alone uninstaller app.

Installing:
- Install the ACL via Preware or WebOS Quick Install ONLY
- Launch the ACL app from your launcher.
- Step through the onboarding steps to bypass activation.
- Reboot ASAP to deploy Android.

Uninstalling:
- Remove the ACL app from the launcher
- Launch the Uninstaller app to trigger the clean-up
- Reboot immediately.

You can re-install the ACL if you accidentally delete the Uninstaller. Once you reboot after the Uninstaller runs, you can re-install ACL again if you want.
